__TOC__

Ubuntu uses Launchpad's Translations component (codenamed <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/rosetta|Rosetta]]</nowiki>), a Web-based translation system, for its translations.

* <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/Translations/StartingToTranslate|User guide for Launchpad Translations]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/rosetta/+faqs|Launchpad Translations FAQ]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/rosetta/|Support for Launchpad Translations]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/|Translation problems in Ubuntu]]</nowiki>: or directly on the language pack bug page for that particular language (eg. https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/language-pack-de for German — replace final "de" with your language code)
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/rosetta/|Bug reports and feature requests for Launchpad Translations]]</nowiki>
